name: Me & My Pets 3D
overview: Pamper them, offer them a comfortable home and entertain them with funny minigames. Care for dogs, cats, horses, rabbits, guinea pigs, birds and fishes! Have fun in minigames like feeding, playing, stroking, brushing, grooming or going for a walk. Enjoy exciting horse rides on the back of a Haflinger, Arabian & Co. using the amazing gyroscope controls of your Nintendo 3DS™. Upgrade your compounds and keep an eye on the individual needs of each animal. Visit the store and buy food, medicine, toys or accessories for your pets. Collect Play Coins and spend them in the pet store. Earn stars by mastering your tasks very well and change them into great ingame extras. Supports Circle Pad controls of your Nintendo 3DS. 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game.
